channel.title: Pages on The Miata Finder Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on The Miata Finder Blog

item.title: About
item.description:
Welcome To The Miata Finder Blog!

Here you will find me posting pictures of my 1991 Miata (pictured below) alongside other Miata (sometimes any Mazda car!).

This idea was started by my brother who suggested we leave polaroids when we park next to other Miatas. I really liked that idea and decided to take it one step further by creating this blog. Thanks for checking out my blog.

You can contact me via email at ubaldo@nopal.cc

This blog currently uses the Hugo Blog Awesome Blog. I plan to make my own theme for this website at somepoint, so look out for that in the future.
